subject: Flash Sale - 15pack recurring revenue boost
preview: Fellow agency partners,  Thank you for yet another wonderful year. It still doesn't feel real to know that we've helped our agency partners generate over $1,000,000 per year in new recurring revenue,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Fellow agency partners,

Thank you for yet another wonderful year. It still doesn't feel real to know that we've helped our agency partners generate over $1,000,000 per year in new recurring revenue, simply by helping them help their clients get comprehensive, up-to-date policies in place! We have assembled a great team thanks to all of your support and we are looking forward to taking the company to the next level (with a new, upgraded user experience) over the next year with you!

With all the chummy stuff out of the way, it's now time for our annual flash sale!
FLASH SALE - 15PACK

For the next 24 hours, we are opening up our most popular bulk special for all existing agency partners (that means you!).

15 Termageddon licenses ($1,800/year reseller value) for only $328.90/year
(You will be prompted to add your card details first if you have not previously purchased a license. Click 'Buy in Bulk' to access/purchase the 15pack.)

Included:
  1. 15 Termageddon licenses
  2. $1,800/yr recurring value - Plus $1,800-$3,600 upfront in setup fees.
  3. Pre-written email sequence
  4. Free swag item
  5. 30 day guarantee

This deal pays for itself with just 3 client signups at $120/yr each! Plus we recommend charging $100-$200 per client in installation fees.

Reminder: as an agency partner, you can already buy licenses, one at a time, at wholesale rates (see reseller info). Bulk deals are just for extra savings (plus free swag). Don't want to resell? Check out our affiliate program (which includes complimentary onboardings).
Click here to purchase 15pack special
(You will be prompted to add your card details first if you have not previously purchased a license. Click 'Buy in Bulk' to access/purchase the 15pack.)
IN OTHER NEWS:

Google Ads starts blocking websites with no consent solution from advertising
Planning to run ads on Google for yourself and/or your clients? If yes, you may find yourself receiving a notice in the Google Ads dashboard, requiring you to provide a cookie consent solution to your website visitors. More governments are cracking down on large digital ad networks, requiring them to ensure the ads they serve link to websites that have a proper cookie consent solution in place. And the good news is that Usercentrics (the consent solution we provide with each Termageddon license) is a certified Google consent integration partner! Simply ensure you've added the Usercentrics script to the top of your <head> (for WordPress users, our plugin can help with that) and you are good to go!

Termageddon's President re-elected as Chair of ABA's ePrivacy Committee
Yet another shout out to Donata for being re-elected as Chair of the American Bar Association's ePrivacy Committee. Donata has helped grow this committee to over 600 attorney members and continues to help provide guidance to legislators on how to write privacy laws while bringing experts from around the world together to discuss the future of privacy. If you want to hear Donata speak on privacy, her new Privacy Lawls podcast covers the latest trends in privacy, accompanied with some of the most well known privacy experts in industry!

Still not using the Website Policies Waiver?!
We'll say it until we're blue in the face: the websites you build today will be facing the privacy laws of tomorrow. If you're building sites that collect personal information (names, email, etc.) through contact forms, newsletter signups, analytics tools or by any other means, you need to ensure your clients understand it is their responsibility to comply with applicable privacy laws (not yours). Our website policies waiver takes the guesswork out of how to do this and ensures your clients are presented with choices as to what they want to do about website policies. Educate your clients, protect your agency!

And the good news is that a lot of new clients will want to sign up with Termageddon! The website policies waiver is a major reason why earlier this year our agency partners surpassed generating over $1,000,000/yr in reseller recurring revenues for themselves! Simply implement the waiver into your processes to ensure you get signatures with each site you launch, and before you know it, you'll be ready to buy another bulk deal!

Having trouble getting clients to sign the waiver? Check out our updated partnership with Waiversign, which is making it easier than ever to get signatures from your website clients.

Black Friday coming up - this event can help you maximize savings
Calling all Black Friday deal preppers! Cloudways is hosting Prepathon, an event to help make sure you get access to all the great black friday deals within the WordPress space. Interested? Feel free to register here and check out the free event!
Thank you
With so many new privacy laws going into effect, and so many privacy bills being proposed, we have entered a new era when it comes to regulations within the web design industry. We at Termageddon are excited to take on this new challenge and help as many agencies (and their clients) as we can. We are incredibly thankful you chose Termageddon as your policy generator provider and your strategy to keep policies up to date over time!

Hans Skillrud

Cofounder

Termageddon LLC

 312-754-1829
mc@termageddon.com
termageddon.com
By unsubscribing, you will no longer receive updates when the laws change, nor notifications when your policies need to be updated. Please email me if you'd like to only receive law updates.
